meanings.definition: In good spirits; happy and optimistic.
meanings.sent1: She always has a cheery smile on her face.
meanings.sent2: The cheery sun warmed their backs as they walked.
meanings.sent3: The cheery puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Her cheery laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The cheery song lifted everyone's mood instantly.

meanings.sent1: The cheery flowers bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The cheery room was painted in soft pastel colors.
meanings.sent3: The cheery painting added a pop of color to the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her cheery dress sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The cheery sky was painted in shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: A person who is cheerful and friendly.
meanings.sent1: She is known as the cheery one in our group.
meanings.sent2: The cheery greeted everyone with a warm smile.
meanings.sent3: The cheery at the party made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent4: The little cheery always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The cheery's positive attitude was contagious to all around.
